page.title: 16Industry
page.content: Industry in this area is limited to a small number of light industries. Most of these industries are concentrated to the south of the town on its east side of the river. Existing industy in this area includes: The largest factory is one which produces finished aluminium goods, a second produces huge concrete pipes, others include a double glazing manufacturer, a farm supply company and factory producing television and audio equipment. There have been attempts made to encourage other industry to the area, especially as several have died out or have moved away, but most attempts fail owing to the more suitable arrangements to be had at the nearby new town of Telford.
